articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo says Manchester United must "rebuild everything" in order to compete for the biggest prizes in club football again.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Forward questions mentality of Man Utd boss Erik ten Hag and calls for 'rebuild'

articles.description: McLaren are to prioritise Lando Norris over team-mate Oscar Piastri in their bid to win both Formula 1 world championships this year, team principal Andrea Stella tells BBC Sport.
articles.title: McLaren ask Oscar Piastri to back Lando Norris F1 title bid

articles.description: England slump to a 28-run defeat by Australia in the first T20 international at Utilita Bowl.
articles.title: England vs Australia: Travis Head sets tourists on way to convincing T20 win

articles.description: The Solheim Cup is a revolutionary tournament born out of the success of a revolutionary putter.
articles.title: Solheim Cup: How a revolutionary club sparked a golf revolution

articles.description: Being England boss is not the "impossible job" but "a really good one", says interim boss Lee Carsley.
articles.title: Lee Carsley: England interim boss plays down 'impossible job' reference

articles.description: Jon Rahm says he has no intention of paying his outstanding DP World Tour fines as the row over his Ryder Cup eligibility rumbles on.
articles.title: Ryder Cup 2025: Jon Rahm wants to play for Europe against US but won't pay DP World Tour fines

articles.description: Cleveland Browns quarterback Deshaun Watson "strongly denies" the latest sexual assault allegations made against him, his attorney said on Wednesday.
articles.title: Deshaun Watson: Cleveland Browns quarterback strongly denies allegations, says attorney

articles.description: BBC Sport explores the split between Chelsea's co-owners, Todd Boehly and Clearlake Capital, led by Behdad Eghbali.
articles.title: Chelsea ownership row: Todd Boehly & Clearlake split explained

articles.description: Manchester United report a net loss of £113.2m in the year to 30 June, their latest accounts show.
articles.title: Manchester United report net loss of £113.2m in 2023-24

articles.description: Dan Evans ensures Great Britain's quest to reach the Davis Cup knockout stage starts strongly with a hard-fought victory in their opening tie against Finland.
articles.title: Davis Cup 2024: Dan Evans puts Great Britain ahead against Finland
